CustomField.description:
Primarily used in Chili Piper forms to store `Company Name` values. Alternative text field used due to standard Name field being a lookup relationship (Id type) that cannot be edited from a text company name value.
External Systems Utilization: Chili Piper
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Primarily used in Chili Piper forms to store `Company Name` values.
CustomField.label: Company
